attributes.action: remain true to the principles he stood for as excellent, successful, committed Chancellor, and not to give in to the media search for charisma, spin, veneer or drama.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a tutor of the Open University and Birmingham University, and currently a PhD student at the Institute of Education, London University, I can vouch for many colleagues who believe Gordon Brown represents the best in British ideals. As we research the professional development of critical global citizenship, and an education to equip our youth for deliberative democracy, we appreciate the principles reflected in the Prime Minister's life and work. We also regret the way the media and current consumer culture has forced the Prime Minister to respond to less worthy criteria for public approval, narrow interests, and short-term success.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
